name: SoarPort
tag_list: floorplan, blueprint, diagram, plan, chart, viewer, embedded, free, large-image
overview:
SoarPort facilitates large dimension image publishing with an embeddable viewer that allows bloggers and website owners to include their large dimension images within their pages. The SoarPort viewer allows the audience to “soar” overhead, just as they might if they were using Google Maps, MapPoint, or OpenStreetMaps.org.

With SoarPort, this same “soaring” action can be customized for use with a vast array of different images including floorplans, organizational charts, class/database diagrams as well as large dimension photography. SoarPort.com also aims to provide an opportunity for community members to engage in networking to view other member’s content; provide comments, and personalize their own profile. SoarPort.com has just launched, and is currently in public beta.
